Title: 35813 - Taking a Bite of the Big Apple: # Unique Tours of NYC
Direction: 500 words: List 3-6 different, somewhat offbeat ways to tour New York. The client link is to a hotel guide, so you could do an item on visiting various famous hotels like the Chelsea. The assignment also mentions that a sports tour related link will be in the final article, so you could do a sports subhead about visiting all the major sporting venues. Other ideas would include a music tour or a museum tour. Your audience consists of travelers and people who are interested in touring NYC.
Extra Writer Notes: A link to Touring NYC Sports will be included in this article. Please bold the anchor text you'd like to use for this link.

Title: 35819 - The Great Outdoors: # Cost Effective Outdoor Activities to Check Out in NYC
Direction:
500 words: List 3-6 cost effective outdoor activities to check out while you're in NYC.
Discuss free or low cost events or outdoor activities such as farmers markets, parks, parades or going to a Giants or Yankee game (this is where you can include the secondary client link) etc. You can include the main client link when discussing NY hotel accommodations (Assign to You discuss locations to stay in that are close to lots of outdoor activities). Your audience consists of travelers and future travelers to NYC.
Extra Writer Notes: A link to Touring NYC Sports will be included in this article. Please bold the anchor text you'd like to use for this link.

Title: 35821 - Family Friendly Activities to Get Your Blood Pumping in NYC
Direction: 500 words – Discuss 3-6 family friendly activities in NYC for tourists. The activities should avoid the obvious (like taking a walk in Central Park or on along the High Line). Consider tours that get a person physically active biking or running, etc. Make sure these activities are family friendly and can be done by both children and adults. One of the activities should be attending a high energy sporting event so you can include the secondary client link. Your audience is travelers who enjoy an active lifestyle. The main client link goes to a page that helps find hotels in NYC, which you can include it at the end after the list of activities.
Extra Writer Notes: A link to Touring NYC Sports will be included in this article. Please bold the anchor text you'd like to use for this link.
